contentList.content: Dhampir
Dhampirs are living creatures who have inherited a taste of a vampire's deathless prowess - and a vampire's taste for blood
Dhampir
Dhampirs are poised between the worlds of the living and the dead, tested endlessly by ravenous thirst
Vicious Thirst

Your dark hunger demands to be slaked. You have a -[1] Penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> and all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell and Attack Rolls</LSTag> until you feed on something with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Vampire_Jaina">Vampiric Bite</LSTag>
Dhampir's Thirst

Every Dhampir knows a thirst slaked only by the living. After each long rest, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Jaina_THIRSTYSTATUS">Vicious Thirst</LSTag> until you feed on someone with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Vampire_Jaina">Vampiric Bite</LSTag>
Deathless Vigor
You are empowered by your vampiric blood. You are resistant to poison, can jump further, and run faster than an average mortal
